body: Okay so there is a reality where he confessed to his childhood-friend and a reality where he went with the black-haired girl... and is apparently an asshole in that reality. Okay I can already see where this is going. Child-hood-friend guy makes a deal with the other guy to peep on the black-haired girl that he can't have now in his reality. But his other self will fuck up the relationship with the child-hood friend and everything ends in disaster
